name: Relight The Dark
description:
Relight The Dark is a chilling and emotionally charged short horror experience that tells a story about a girl living with her abusive mother. In this gripping narrative-driven game, you step into the shoes of a young girl who must confront the horrifying truth about her abusive mother while trying to find a way to escape.

The game's core mechanic revolves around exploration, where the player navigates mother's house, which they have trapped in for as long as they remember. As you explore the dimly lit rooms, you'll gradually uncover the disturbing history of your abusive mother and the dark secret that lurks within the shadows.

Relight The Dark is a remake of my first published game, My Light In The Dark.

TW: Mentions of murder, death, abuse.
